public class SocketClient extends GenericClient
socket based implementation of the client

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    disconnect(boolean error)
    signals the disconnection or failed connection to the view, interrupts the listener thread, closes all streams and sockets.
    boolean
    init()
    initializes the socket based connection; creates the socket and establishes the connection to the server, then assigns the socket streams to the local attributes of the class, sets the connectionStatus to true and starts the listening and the ping threads
    void
    pingServer()
    method used to ping the server every PING_TIME
    void
    readMessages()
    this method reads the latest object sent from the server on the input stream and forwards the right command to the view
    void
    sendMsgToServer(Serializable message)
    method sends serializable object on the output stream

    • init

      public boolean init()
      initializes the socket based connection; creates the socket and establishes the connection to the server, then assigns the socket streams to the local attributes of the class, sets the connectionStatus to true and starts the listening and the ping threads
      Overrides:
      init in class GenericClient
      Returns:
      true if the init succeeded

    • readMessages

      public void readMessages()
      this method reads the latest object sent from the server on the input stream and forwards the right command to the view

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(boolean error)
      signals the disconnection or failed connection to the view, interrupts the listener thread, closes all streams and sockets.
      Overrides:
      disconnect in class GenericClient
      Parameters:
      error - true if the reason for disconnection is an error
